ygData.subject: Collapsable pole
ygData.msgSnippet: The pole IS in the game, it was found on a GM quest mob and given to Gnomad who successfully used it in the recipie to make the spyglass. My theory on the pole
ygData.messageBody:
The pole IS in the game, it was found on a GM quest mob and given to Gnomad
who successfully used it in the recipie to make the spyglass.

My theory on the pole is that it is made up of shafts. If you think about
something that collapses, what is it made of?

A series of shafts that are different sizes. The smaller shafts being made
to fit inside the larger shafts.

Therefore, I believe the recipie is going to be made up of a number of
shafts, 2 maybe 3, some kind of twine and some grease.

Just my thoughts...

Rotgut

Collapsable Fishing Pole Known Failure database:

http://www.lockjaw.hamptoncity.com/recipe.html
